showScoreExcerpt:
"Moved around stage with precision and theatrical acumen, the cast of twelve seems to be twice or three times the size...Throughout, there is high drive and a total lack of cynicism...Interaction between the players is loud, fast-paced, and mostly amiable...The lack of what might be called drama threatens to make the piece a minor effort...But it must be said, by the close, 'Come From Awayâ€™s' simple-in-a-good-way, stubbornly empathic/positive vibe moves us with its integrity."
